title: The iSteady V2 with 3-Axis Gimbal and AI Tracking Wins Red Dot Award
content:
Driven by the goal of constantly improving the ability of users to take better smartphone footage, Hohem has received a Red Dot award for the iSteady V2. The iSteady V2 utilizes a combination of the best gimbal features available, to create the ultimate smartphone companion. The post The iSteady V2 with 3-Axis Gimbal and AI Tracking Wins Red Dot Award appeared first on XDA.
